PRESENTACIÓN DE UN CREATIVO JUEGO DE CONSTRUCCIÓN DE ARENAS: Bulwark consiste en diseñar tu fortaleza y expandirla hasta convertirla en un imperio. 
  
Historia: Estás a cargo de los últimos restos de gente libre en Ursee, con la tarea de construir un nuevo hogar. Labra tu camino en el mundo, torre a torre, muro a muro, esculpiendo los imponentes acantilados y las peligrosas aguas de un paisaje implacable que se niega a ser domado.
 
Objetivos del juego: Diseña fantásticos asentamientos de fortalezas oceánicas. Progresar es sencillo, haz crecer las poblaciones de varias facciones y progresarás en sus Soultrees. Desbloquea comandantes y capitanes que puedan trabajar para ti, desbloquea nuevos barcos, unidades y habilidades.
 
Juega a tu manera:   
  
Bulwark - Explora la Gran Urbe mientras construyes tu gran civilización. Busca recursos, crea rutas comerciales y establece alianzas con otras facciones dispersas por las olas mientras equilibras la negociación y el conflicto para hacer crecer tu asentamiento.
 
Freebuild - Disfruta de un acogedor «Modo Freebuild», desprovisto de los conflictos y desafíos presentes en el juego estándar, puedes esbozar y experimentar sin necesidad de recursos, construyendo sin límites. 
  
Conquista Total - La guerra ha llegado a la Gran Urbe. Empiezas en guerra con todas las facciones, la diplomacia está desactivada y la frecuencia y la escala de las incursiones han aumentado. Ya no basta con construir, ahora debes sobrevivir.  
  
Recursos de construcción: La madera, la piedra y el hierro no se almacenan ni se contabilizan, lo único que cuenta es la distancia, no el coste. Transportas recursos a lo largo de tu red de torres, así como rutas comerciales por el mar. Las torres y murallas dentro del alcance del recurso pueden ser mejoradas y construidas gratuitamente, las que están fuera del alcance no.  
  
Esquirlas: La moneda con la que funciona la diplomacia, la construcción de ejércitos, la compra de nuevas localizaciones y edificios únicos es distinta de los recursos, funciona con una moneda llamada Esquirlas. Las obtienes mediante el crecimiento de la población, el comercio con otras facciones o como recompensa de los combates. 
  
Desafío: El juego te reta a diseñar y hacer crecer grandes fortalezas, a menudo con poco coste aparte de establecer rutas comerciales para obtener recursos. A medida que creces puedes invitar a poblaciones de otras facciones que desbloquean contenido exclusivo de su «árbol de almas».  

Pero todo el mundo odia a todo el mundo en Ursee y hacerlo puede llevar a la guerra o a aliados leales que se fusionen con tu imperio. ¡Este sandbox builder tiene consecuencias!

INTRODUIRE UN JEU DE CONSTRUCTION CREATIF EN BOIS DE SABLE : Bulwark consiste à concevoir votre forteresse et à l'étendre pour en faire un empire. 

Histoire : Vous êtes à la tête des derniers vestiges d'un peuple libre sur l'Ursee, chargé de construire un nouveau foyer. Sculptez votre chemin dans un monde, tour par tour, mur par mur, à partir des falaises et des eaux dangereuses d'un paysage impitoyable qui refuse d'être apprivoisé. Il ne suffit plus de construire, il faut maintenant survivre.  

Objectifs du jeu : Concevoir de fantastiques forteresses océaniques. La progression est simple, développez les populations des différentes factions et vous progresserez sur leur arbre des âmes. Débloquez des commandants et des capitaines qui peuvent travailler pour vous, débloquez de nouveaux navires, unités et capacités. 
  
Jouez à votre façon :   
  
Bulwark - Explorez le Grand Ourse et construisez votre grande civilisation. Cherchez des ressources, créez des routes commerciales et concluez des alliances avec d'autres factions disséminées sur les flots, tout en équilibrant négociations et conflits pour développer votre colonie. 
  
Construction libre - Profitez d'un mode de construction libre confortable, dépourvu des conflits et des défis présents dans le jeu standard. Vous pouvez dessiner et expérimenter sans avoir besoin de ressources, en construisant sans limites. 
  
Conquête totale - La guerre est arrivée dans le Grand Ourse. Vous entrez en guerre avec toutes les factions, la diplomatie est désactivée et la fréquence et l'ampleur des raids sont accrues. Il ne suffit plus de construire, il faut maintenant survivre.  

Ressources de construction : Le bois, la pierre et le fer ne sont pas stockés ni comptabilisés, la seule chose qui compte est la distance, pas le coût. Vous transportez les ressources le long de votre réseau de tours et des routes commerciales maritimes. Les tours et les murs à portée de la ressource peuvent être améliorés et construits gratuitement, ceux qui sont hors de portée ne le peuvent pas.  
 
Splinters : La monnaie qui alimente la diplomatie, la construction d'armée, l'achat de nouveaux emplacements et de bâtiments uniques est distincte des ressources, elle fonctionne avec une monnaie appelée Éclats. Vous obtenez ces éclats grâce à la croissance de la population, au commerce avec d'autres factions ou aux récompenses obtenues au combat. 
  
Défi : Le jeu vous met au défi de concevoir et de faire croître de grandes forteresses, souvent à peu de frais, si ce n'est l'établissement de routes commerciales pour les ressources. Au fur et à mesure que vous vous développez, vous pouvez inviter des populations d'autres factions qui débloquent un contenu unique à la faction à partir de leur « arbre d'âme ».  

Mais tout le monde déteste tout le monde sur l'Ursee et cela peut mener à la guerre ou à des alliés loyaux qui fusionnent avec votre empire. Ce constructeur de bac à sable a des conséquences !

EINFÜHRUNG EINES SANDBOX-BAUSPIELS: Bulwark dreht sich darum, deine Festung zu entwerfen und sie zu einem Imperium auszubauen.
   
Geschichte: Du bist verantwortlich für die letzten Überreste freier Menschen auf der Ursee, die mit dem Bau eines neuen Zuhauses beauftragt sind. Bahne dir deinen Weg in die Welt, Turm für Turm, Mauer für Mauer, und forme sie aus den bedrohlichen Klippen und gefährlichen Gewässern einer unbarmherzigen Landschaft, die sich nicht zähmen lässt. 
  
Spielziele:  Entwerfe fantastische Festungssiedlungen auf dem Ozean. Der Fortschritt ist einfach: Wachse die Populationen verschiedener Fraktionen und du wirst in ihren Seelenbäumen voranschreiten, indem du Kommandanten und Kapitäne freischaltest, die für dich arbeiten können, und neue Schiffe, Einheiten und Fähigkeiten freischaltest. 
  
Spiele auf deine Weise: Es gibt drei separate Spielmodi, die unterschiedliche Spielerlebnisse bieten. 
  
Bulwark - Erkunde die Große Ursee, während du deine große Zivilisation aufbaust. Plündere Ressourcen, errichte Handelsrouten und schließe Allianzen mit anderen Fraktionen, die über die Wellen verstreut sind, während du Verhandlung und Konflikt ausbalancierst, um deine Siedlung zu erweitern. 
  
Freier Aufbau: Genieße einen gemütlichen „Freier Aufbau“-Modus, frei von den Konflikten und Herausforderungen des Standardspiels; du kannst ohne Ressourcen skizzieren und experimentieren, ohne Einschränkungen bauen. 
  
Totale Eroberung: Der Krieg ist über die Große Ursee gekommen. Du beginnst im Krieg mit jeder Fraktion, Diplomatie ist deaktiviert und die Häufigkeit und das Ausmaß der Überfälle ist erhöht. Es reicht nicht mehr, nur zu bauen - jetzt musst du überleben. 
  
Baumaterialien: Holz, Stein und Eisen werden nicht gespeichert oder gezählt; das einzige, was zählt, ist die Entfernung, nicht die Kosten. Du transportierst Ressourcen entlang deines Turmnetzwerks sowie über Handelsrouten über das Meer. Türme und Mauern innerhalb der Reichweite der Ressource können kostenlos aufgerüstet und gebaut werden, außerhalb der Reichweite nicht. 
 
Splitter: Die Währung, die Diplomatie, Armeebau, den Kauf neuer Orte und einzigartiger Gebäude antreibt, ist von Ressourcen getrennt; sie läuft auf einer Währung namens Splitter. Du gewinnst sie durch Bevölkerungswachstum, Handel mit anderen Fraktionen oder als Belohnungen aus Kämpfen. 
  
Herausforderung: Das Spiel fordert dich heraus, großartige Festungen zu entwerfen und zu bauen, oft zu geringen Kosten, außer dem Einrichten von Handelsrouten für Ressourcen. Während du wächst, kannst du Bevölkerungen aus anderen Fraktionen einladen, was fraktionsspezifische Inhalte aus ihrem „Seelenbaum“ freischaltet. 

Aber jeder hasst jeden auf der Ursee und dies könnte zu Krieg oder loyalen Verbündeten führen, die sich deinem Imperium anschließen. Dieser Sandbox-Baumeister hat Konsequenzen!

INTRODUKTION AF ET KREATIVT SANDKASSEBYGNINGSSPIL: Bulwark handler om at designe din fæstning og udvide den til et imperium. 

Historie: Du har ansvaret for de sidste rester af frie mennesker på Ursee og har til opgave at bygge et nyt hjem. Skab din vej ind i en verden, tårn for tårn, mur for mur, formet af de skræmmende klipper og farlige farvande i et uforsonligt landskab, der nægter at lade sig tæmme. 
  
Spillets mål: Design fantastiske bosættelser med havfæstninger. Fremskridt er enkelt, få befolkningerne i de forskellige fraktioner til at vokse, og du vil gøre fremskridt på deres Soultrees. Lås op for kommandanter og kaptajner, der kan arbejde for dig, og lås op for nye skibe, enheder og evner. 
  
Spil på din måde: 

Bulwark - Udforsk Great Ursee, mens du opbygger din store civilisation. Søg efter ressourcer, skab handelsruter og indgå alliancer med andre fraktioner spredt ud over bølgerne, mens du balancerer forhandling og konflikt for at få din bosættelse til at vokse. 
  
Freebuild - Nyd den hyggelige »Freebuild Mode«, der er blottet for konflikter og udfordringer i standardspillet, hvor du kan skitsere og eksperimentere uden behov for ressourcer og bygge uden grænser. 
  
Total Conquest - Krigen er kommet til Great Ursee. Du starter i krig med alle fraktioner, diplomatiet er deaktiveret, og hyppigheden og omfanget af raids er øget. Det er ikke længere nok bare at bygge - nu skal du overleve.  
  
Byggeressourcer: Træ, sten og jern bliver ikke opbevaret eller talt op, det eneste, der tæller, er afstanden, ikke prisen. Du transporterer ressourcer langs dit netværk af tårne og handelsruter over havet. Tårne og mure inden for ressourcens rækkevidde kan opgraderes og bygges gratis, men ikke dem uden for rækkevidde.  
  
Splinters: Den valuta, der driver diplomati, hæropbygning, køb af nye steder og unikke bygninger, er adskilt fra ressourcer, den kører på en valuta kaldet Splinters. Du får dem gennem befolkningstilvækst, handel med andre fraktioner eller som belønning for kamp. 
  
Udfordring: Spillet udfordrer dig til at designe og udbygge store fæstninger, ofte uden andre omkostninger end at etablere handelsruter for ressourcer. Efterhånden som du vokser, kan du invitere befolkninger fra andre fraktioner, som låser op for fraktionsspecifikt indhold fra deres »soultree«.  

Men alle hader alle på Ursee, og det kan føre til krig eller til loyale allierede, der fusionerer med dit imperium. Denne sandkassebygger har konsekvenser!

INTRODUZIONE DI UN GIOCO DI COSTRUZIONE CREATIVO: Bulwark consiste nel progettare la propria fortezza ed espanderla in un impero. 

Storia: Sei a capo degli ultimi resti di un popolo libero sull'Ursee, con il compito di costruire una nuova casa. Scolpisci il tuo cammino in un mondo, torre dopo torre, muro dopo muro, scolpendo le scoraggianti scogliere e le pericolose acque di un paesaggio spietato che si rifiuta di essere domato. 
  
Obiettivi del gioco: Progettare fantastici insediamenti-fortezza sull'oceano. I progressi sono semplici: fai crescere le popolazioni delle varie fazioni e progredirai nelle loro Soultre. Sbloccare comandanti e capitani che possono lavorare per voi, sbloccare nuove navi, unità e abilità. 
  
Gioca a modo tuo:   
  
Bulwark - Esplora il Grande Ursee mentre costruisci la tua grande civiltà. Cercate risorse, create rotte commerciali e stringete alleanze con altre fazioni sparse tra le onde, bilanciando negoziati e conflitti per far crescere il vostro insediamento. 
  
Freebuild - Godetevi l'accogliente modalità “Freebuild”, priva dei conflitti e delle sfide presenti nel gioco standard: potrete abbozzare e sperimentare senza bisogno di risorse, costruendo senza limiti. 
  
Conquista totale - La guerra è arrivata nel Grande Ursee. Si parte in guerra con ogni fazione, la diplomazia è disattivata e la frequenza e la portata delle incursioni sono aumentate. Non basta più costruire, ora bisogna sopravvivere.  
  
Risorse per la costruzione: Il legno, la pietra e il ferro non vengono immagazzinati né conteggiati: l'unica cosa che conta è la distanza, non il costo. Le risorse vengono trasportate lungo la rete di torri e le rotte commerciali sul mare. Le torri e le mura che si trovano nel raggio d'azione della risorsa possono essere potenziate e costruite gratuitamente, quelle che si trovano fuori dal raggio d'azione no.  
  
Schegge: La valuta che alimenta la diplomazia, la costruzione dell'esercito, l'acquisto di nuove località e di edifici unici è separata dalle risorse e si basa su una valuta chiamata Schegge. Si ottengono attraverso la crescita della popolazione, il commercio con altre fazioni o come ricompensa per i combattimenti. 
  
Sfida: Il gioco vi sfida a progettare e a far crescere grandi fortezze, spesso con costi minimi se non la creazione di rotte commerciali per le risorse. Man mano che si cresce, si possono invitare popolazioni di altre fazioni, che sbloccano contenuti esclusivi della fazione dal loro “albero dell'anima”.  

Ma tutti odiano tutti sull'Ursee e questo può portare alla guerra o ad alleati fedeli che si fondono con il vostro impero. Questo costruttore di sandbox ha delle conseguenze!

title: Kenshi
description:
A free-roaming squad based RPG focusing on open-ended sandbox gameplay features rather than a linear story. Be a trader, a thief, a rebel, a warlord, an adventurer, a farmer, a slave, or just food for the cannibals. 
 
    
 
 Research new equipment and craft new gear. Purchase and upgrade your own buildings to use as safe fortified havens when things go bad, or use them to start up a business. Aid or oppose the various factions in the world while striving for the strength and wealth necessary to simply survive in the harsh desert. Train your men up from puny victims to master warriors. Carry your wounded squad mates to safety and get them all home alive. FEATURES 
       
  Freeform gameplay in a seamless game world  in the largest single-player RPG world since Daggerfall, stretching over 870 square kilometers. The game will never seek to limit you or restrict your personal play style. 
 
       
  Custom design as many characters as you want  and build up a whole squad to fight for you. Characters will grow and become stronger with experience, not just in their stats but their appearance too. 
 
       
  Build a base  where you can research new technologies, upgrade your defences and craft new gear. 
 
    
  Original take on the RTS-RPG hybrid genre.  No "hero" characters with artificially stronger stats than everybody else- Every character and NPC you meet is potentially an equal, and has a name, a life. 
 
    
  You are not the chosen one.  You're not great and powerful. You don't have more 'hitpoints' than everyone else. You are not the center of the universe, and you are not special. Unless you work for it.
 
    
  Purchase and upgrade your own buildings  to use as safe fortified havens when things go bad, or use them to start up a business. 
 
    
  Variation and possibilities of gameplay.  Be good, be evil, be a businessman, be a thief, live in a town, live in the desert, travel alone, travel in hordes, build a fortress, raze a city. Devote yourself to freeing slaves, or maybe end up a slave yourself. 
 
    
  Dynamic, ever changing world.  Support or hinder whoever you wish, or keep to yourself, the world won't stop moving. This is not just a "game", you are living and surviving in a simulated world.
 
    
  Get captured by cannibals and eaten alive , or sold off by slavers and forced to work in the mines. These are not scripted events, just a regular part of this chaotic world that ruins your life by chance. Anything can happen, yet anything can be overcome if you have the strength. 
 
    
  Absolutely no Level-scaling.  The world does not level up along with you, and the shops don't change their inventory to only items matching your level. At the start of the game almost everyone will be stronger than you, and survival will always be a struggle. The game won't hold your hand or help you when you're down. 
 
    
  Realistic medical system that affects gameplay.  A character with a wounded leg will limp or crawl and slow the party down, wounded arms means you must use your sword one-handed or not at all. Severe injuries will result in amputees needing robotic limb replacements. Blood loss means you can pass out, and the blood will attract predators. A character’s stats are affected by equipment, encumbrance, blood loss, injuries and starvation. 
 
    
  Intelligent AI  that allows for characters to reason and work towards long-term goals and desires. Squads work together and carry their wounded to safety. Characters can be setup to take care of micromanagement for you and run production in your base. 
 
    
  Aid or oppose the various factions  in the world while striving for the strength and wealth necessary to simply survive in the harsh environment. 
 
    
  Independently developed  with no design influences, or alterations dictated by men in gray suits who have never played a game before in their lives. 
 
    
  Original game world.  There are no fantasy-knock-off cliches. No magic.

localized_description.text:
款以自由行动小分队为基础的角色扮演RPG类游戏，专注于开放式的沙盒游戏功能而非线性故事。选择成为商人、小偷、反叛者、军阀、冒险者、农民、奴隶或是食人族的牙祭。
 
    
 
 探索新设备，锻造新装备。购买并升级您的自有建筑，在形势恶化时使用其充当安全加固的避难所，或使用其开始创业。帮助或对抗世界内各种各样的帮派，同时争取在艰苦的沙漠中生存所需的力量与财富。训练您的角色使其从弱小的受害者逐渐变为强大的战士。将受伤的小分队伙伴带到安全地点，并让他们全部活着回家。 特点  
        
 款具有无缝游戏世界的自由游戏，是自匕首雨（Daggerfall）以来最大的单人RPG类世界，面积超过870平方公里。此游戏永远不会限制您的个人游戏风格。
 
       
 根据您的需要设计尽可能多的角色，并建立一个完整的小分队为你而战。角色会随着经验的增长而变强，这不仅仅体现在他们的状态数据中，外表也是。
 
    
 首次采用了RTS-RPG的混合体裁。没有人工设置成比其他人拥有更强状态的“英雄”角色。——您遇到的每个角色和NPC都可能是平等的，有名字、有生活。
 
    
 您并非天选之子。您并不强大。您也没有比他人更多的生命值。您并非宇宙的中心，也不特别。除非 您能努力挣得上述的一切。
 
       
 建造一个您能研究新科技的基地，升级您的防御并锻造新的装备。
 
    
 购买并升级您的自有建筑，在形势恶化时使用其充当安全加固的避难所，或使用其开始创业。
 
    
 游戏玩法的变化和可能性。为善、为恶，做商人、做小偷，住在城镇、住在沙漠，独自旅行、成群结队，建造堡垒、夷平城市。致力于解放奴隶，或者自己最终成为奴隶。
 
    
 个不断变化的世界。按您的想法支持或阻碍任何人，或坚守自我，世界可不会停止转动。这不仅仅是一个“游戏”，你正在模拟的世界中生活和生存。
 
    
 被食人族抓住并生吃，或是被奴隶主出售并在矿井中被强制干活。这些都不是事先计划好的事件，而是这一混乱世界内的日常部分，只是偶然地摧毁了您的生活。任何事情都有可能发生，但如果您有实力，任何事情也都能被克服。
 
    
 绝对不会有等级分配制度。世界不会与您同步升级，商店也不会将库存更改为仅储存与您的级别相匹配的商品。在游戏开始时，几乎每个人都比你强大，生存将永远是一场斗争。当你沮丧时，游戏可不会握住你的手或帮助你。
 
    
 影响游戏玩法的现实医疗系统。带有伤腿的角色会跛行或爬行并拖慢整个小分队的行动，受伤的手臂意味着您必须单手或根本不使用您的剑。严重受伤将导致截肢者需要机器人肢体以进行替换。失血意味着您会昏倒，而血液会吸引掠食者。角色状态将受设备、负重、失血、受伤和饥饿的影响。
 
    
 智能AI可允许角色分析并努力实现长期目标和护送。小分队成员将一起工作，并将伤员护送至安全的地点。可以设置角色来为您进行微观管理并在您的基地中经营生产。
 
    
 帮助或对抗世界内各种各样的帮派，只不过需要争取在艰苦的环境中生存所需的力量与财富。
 
    
 完全独立的开发，未受任何设计的影响，也从不因那些穿着灰色西装、以前从未玩过游戏的男人们而改变。
 
    
 原始的游戏世界。没有阻挡幻想的老套剧情。也不会有魔法。

A free-roaming squad based RPG focusing on open-ended sandbox gameplay features rather than a linear story. Be a trader, a thief, a rebel, a warlord, an adventurer, a farmer, a slave, or just food for the cannibals. 
 
    
 
 Research new equipment and craft new gear. Purchase and upgrade your own buildings to use as safe fortified havens when things go bad, or use them to start up a business. Aid or oppose the various factions in the world while striving for the strength and wealth necessary to simply survive in the harsh desert. Train your men up from puny victims to master warriors. Carry your wounded squad mates to safety and get them all home alive. FEATURES 
       
  Freeform gameplay in a seamless game world  in the largest single-player RPG world since Daggerfall, stretching over 870 square kilometers. The game will never seek to limit you or restrict your personal play style. 
 
       
  Custom design as many characters as you want  and build up a whole squad to fight for you. Characters will grow and become stronger with experience, not just in their stats but their appearance too. 
 
       
  Build a base  where you can research new technologies, upgrade your defences and craft new gear. 
 
    
  Original take on the RTS-RPG hybrid genre.  No "hero" characters with artificially stronger stats than everybody else- Every character and NPC you meet is potentially an equal, and has a name, a life. 
 
    
  You are not the chosen one.  You're not great and powerful. You don't have more 'hitpoints' than everyone else. You are not the center of the universe, and you are not special. Unless you work for it.
 
    
  Purchase and upgrade your own buildings  to use as safe fortified havens when things go bad, or use them to start up a business. 
 
    
  Variation and possibilities of gameplay.  Be good, be evil, be a businessman, be a thief, live in a town, live in the desert, travel alone, travel in hordes, build a fortress, raze a city. Devote yourself to freeing slaves, or maybe end up a slave yourself. 
 
    
  Dynamic, ever changing world.  Support or hinder whoever you wish, or keep to yourself, the world won't stop moving. This is not just a "game", you are living and surviving in a simulated world.
 
    
  Get captured by cannibals and eaten alive , or sold off by slavers and forced to work in the mines. These are not scripted events, just a regular part of this chaotic world that ruins your life by chance. Anything can happen, yet anything can be overcome if you have the strength. 
 
    
  Absolutely no Level-scaling.  The world does not level up along with you, and the shops don't change their inventory to only items matching your level. At the start of the game almost everyone will be stronger than you, and survival will always be a struggle. The game won't hold your hand or help you when you're down. 
 
    
  Realistic medical system that affects gameplay.  A character with a wounded leg will limp or crawl and slow the party down, wounded arms means you must use your sword one-handed or not at all. Severe injuries will result in amputees needing robotic limb replacements. Blood loss means you can pass out, and the blood will attract predators. A character’s stats are affected by equipment, encumbrance, blood loss, injuries and starvation. 
 
    
  Intelligent AI  that allows for characters to reason and work towards long-term goals and desires. Squads work together and carry their wounded to safety. Characters can be setup to take care of micromanagement for you and run production in your base. 
 
    
  Aid or oppose the various factions  in the world while striving for the strength and wealth necessary to simply survive in the harsh environment. 
 
    
  Independently developed  with no design influences, or alterations dictated by men in gray suits who have never played a game before in their lives. 
 
    
  Original game world.  There are no fantasy-knock-off cliches. No magic.

Un videojuego de rol de mundo abierto con estrategias a tiempo real y con eventos que no tienen una secuencia argumentativa lineal. Sé un comerciante, un ladrón, un rebelde, un señor de la guerra, un aventurero, un granjero, un esclavo o tan sólo comida para los caníbales.
 
    
 
 Investiga y crea nuevos equipos. Compra y mejora tus propios edificios para usarlos como refugios fortificados seguros cuando las cosas se ponen feas, o para emprender un negocio. Ayuda o enfréntate a las diferentes facciones en el mundo a la vez que luchas por tener la fuerza y riqueza necesarias para simplemente sobrevivir en el hostil desierto. Entrena a tus hombres para que partiendo de enclenques víctimas se conviertan en guerreros magistrales. Traslada a tus compañeros de escuadrón heridos a un lugar seguro y devuélvelos a casa con vida. FEATURES 
       
  Jugabilidad no lineal con gran libertad de acción en un mundo sin interrupciones  en el más extenso RPG para un único jugador desde Daggerfall, cuya extensión supera los 870 kilómetros cuadrados. El juego nunca intentará limitarte ni restringir tu estilo de juego personal.
 
       
  Diseña a medida tantos personajes como quieras  y crea todo un escuadrón para que luche por ti. Los personajes crecerán y se harán más fuertes con la experiencia, no solo en las estadísticas si no en su aspecto.
 
       
  Crea una base  donde investigar nuevas tecnologías, mejorar tus defensas y elaborar nuevos equipos.
 
    
  Versión original del género híbrido RTS-RPG.  No hay personajes “héroes” con estadísticas artificialmente más fuertes que el resto- Cada personaje y NPC que conoces es potencialmente un igual, y tiene un nombre, una vida.
 
    
  No eres el elegido.  No eres grande ni poderoso. No tienes más 'puntos de vida’' que nadie. No eres el centro del universo, ni eres especial. A no ser que trabajes para ello.
 
    
  Compra y mejora tus propios edificios  para usarlos como refugios fortificados seguros cuando las cosas se pongan feas, o para emprender un negocio.
 
    
  Variación y posibilidades de juego.  Sé bueno, sé malvado, sé un hombre de negocios, sé un ladrón, vive en un pueblo, vive en el desierto, viaja a solas, viaja en horda, construye una fortaleza, arrasa una ciudad. Dedícate a liberar esclavos o tal vez acaba siendo un esclavo.
 
    
  Mundo dinámico, en continuo cambio.  Apoya o entorpece a quien quieras, o ve a lo tuyo, el mundo no se detendrá. Éste no es solo un “juego”, estás viviendo y sobreviviendo en un mundo simulado.
 
    
  Sé capturado por caníbales y comido con vida , o vendido a esclavistas y obligado a trabajar en las minas. Estos no son eventos guionizados, simplemente una parte de este caótico mundo que arruina tu vida por casualidad. Cualquier cosa puede suceder y la vez que todo puede ser superado si tienes la fortaleza.
 
    
  Sin escalado de nivel en absoluto.  El mundo no sube de nivel a la vez que tú lo haces, y las tiendas no cambian su inventario únicamente a artículos que coinciden con tu nivel. Al principio del juego casi todo el mundo será más fuerte que tú, y la supervivencia siempre será una lucha. El juego no te llevará de la mano ni te ayudará cuando hayas caído.
 
    
  Sistema médico realista que afecta al modo de juego.  Un personaje con una pierna herida cojeará o se arrastrará y retrasará al grupo, tener brazos heridos supondrá que tendrás que usar tu espada con una sola mano o ninguna. Lesiones graves conllevarán amputaciones y necesitarás sustituirlos con miembros robóticos. La pérdida de sangre significa que puedes desmayarte, y la sangre atraerá a depredadores. Las estadísticas de un personaje se ven afectadas por el equipo, la carga, la pérdida de sangre, las lesiones y el hambre.
 
    
  IA inteligente  que permite a los personajes razonar y trabajar en pos de objetivos y deseos a largo plazo. Los escuadrones trabajan juntos y trasladan a sus heridos a un lugar seguro. Los personajes pueden ser configurados para cuidar de la microgestión y encargarse de la producción en su base.
 
    
  Ayuda o enfréntate a las distintas facciones  en el mundo a la vez que luchas por tener la fuerza y riqueza necesarias para simplemente sobrevivir en el ambiente hostil.
 
    
  Desarrollado de manera independiente  sin influencias en el diseño, ni modificaciones dictadas por hombres de trajes grises que no han jugado a un videojuego en su vida.
 
    
  Mundo del juego original.  No hay clichés de fantasía. Ni magia.

Un RPG en escouade dans un monde ouvert, avec un gameplay de type sandbox plutôt qu’une histoire linéaire. Vous pourrez y être un marchand, un voleur, un rebelle, un chef de guerre, un aventurier, un fermier, un esclave… ou juste de la nourriture pour cannibales.
 
    
 
 Recherchez du matériel et fabriquez de nouveaux équipements. Achetez et améliorez vos propres bâtiments. Faites-en des abris fortifiés où vous réfugier quand les choses tournent mal, ou utilisez-les pour démarrer une activité. Aidez ou combattez les diverses factions existant dans le monde tout en veillant à conserver assez de forces et de richesse… Vous en aurez besoin pour survivre dans ce désert impitoyable. Entraînez vos hommes au combat pour qu’ils passent du statut de frêles victimes à celui de maîtres guerriers. Portez les blessés de votre escouade pour les mettre en sécurité et les ramener vivants à la base. FONCTIONNALITÉS 
       
  Un gameplay libre au sein d’un univers fluide , dans le plus grand monde de RPG solo depuis Daggerfall. S’étendant sur plus de 870 km², le jeu n’essayera jamais de vous limiter ni de restreindre votre style de jeu personnel.
 
       
  Créez des personnages sur mesure , autant que vous le voudrez, et formez toute une escouade qui se battra pour vous. Les personnages évolueront et deviendront plus forts avec l’expérience, pas seulement dans leurs stats mais aussi dans leur apparence.
 
    
  Une variante originale du genre hybride RTS-RPG . Pas de personnages « héros » aux stats artificiellement plus hautes que celles des autres. Tous les personnages et PNJ que vous rencontrez sont potentiellement vos égaux et ont un nom, une vie.
 
    
  Vous n’êtes pas l’élu . Vous n’êtes ni remarquable ni puissant. Vous n’avez pas plus de points de vie que les autres. Vous n’êtes pas le centre de l’univers, et vous n’avez rien de spécial. Sauf si vous travaillez dur pour y arriver.
 
       
  Construisez une base  où vous pourrez rechercher de nouvelles technologies, améliorer vos défenses et fabriquer du matériel. Achetez ou améliorez vos propres bâtiments.  Faites-en des abris fortifiés où vous réfugier quand les choses tournent mal, ou utilisez-les pour démarrer une activité. 
 
    
  Variations et possibilités du gameplay.  Vous êtes libre de faire le bien ou le mal, d’être un homme d’affaires ou un voleur, de vivre en ville ou dans le désert, de voyager seul ou en masse, de construire une forteresse ou raser une ville. Vous pouvez vous consacrer à la libération des esclaves, ou peut-être devenir un esclave vous-même.
 
    
  Un monde dynamique en constante évolution . Soutenez ou faites obstacle à qui vous voulez, ou alors gardez vos distances… dans tous les cas, le monde ne cessera pas de changer. Ce n’est pas juste un « jeu », vous vivez et survivez dans un monde simulé.
 
    
  Vous serez peut-être capturé par des cannibales et dévoré vivant,  ou vendu par des esclavagistes et forcé de travailler dans les mines. Ces événements ne sont pas scénarisés, ils font juste partie de ce monde chaotique qui peut détruire votre vie complètement par hasard. Tout peut arriver, mais tout peut aussi être surmonté si vous êtes assez fort.
 
    
  Pas de level scaling.  Le monde ne s’adapte pas à votre progression et les magasins ne changent pas leur inventaire pour proposer seulement des articles adaptés à votre niveau. Au début du jeu presque tout le monde sera plus fort que vous, et vous devrez toujours lutter pour survivre. Le jeu ne va pas vous tenir la main ni vous aider quand vous aurez des ennuis.
 
    
  Système médical réaliste qui affecte le gameplay.  Un personnage blessé à la jambe boitera ou marchera à quatre pattes et ralentira le groupe. Avec des blessures aux bras, vous devrez manier votre épée d’une seule main… ou serez juste incapable de vous en servir. Les blessures graves entraîneront des amputations et les membres devront être remplacés par des prothèses robotiques. La perte de sang pourra conduire à l’évanouissement et attirer des prédateurs. Les stats d’un personnage seront affectées par son matériel, sa charge, ses pertes de sang, ses blessures et sa faim. 
 
    
  IA intelligente  qui permet aux personnages de raisonner et de poursuivre des buts et motivations sur le long terme. Les escouades travaillent ensemble et mettent leurs blessés en sécurité. Vous pouvez demander aux personnages de gérer de nombreuses tâches pour vous et de s’occuper de la production à votre base.
 
    
  Aidez ou combattez les différentes factions  existant dans le monde tout en veillant à conserver assez de forces et de richesse… Vous en aurez besoin pour survivre dans cet environnement impitoyable.
 
    
  Développé de manière indépendante ;  conçu sans influences ni altérations imposées par des hommes en costume gris n’ayant jamais joué à un jeu de leur vie.
 
    
  Un univers de jeu original  qui n’imite pas les clichés fantasy. Certifié sans magie.

Ein, gruppenbasiertes Open-World-Rollenspiel, das grenzenloses Sandbox-Gameplay statt einer linearen Story bietet. Sei ein Händler, Dieb, Rebell, Kriegsherr, Abenteurer, Bauer, Sklave oder einfach nur Kannibalenfutter.
 
    
 
 Erforsche neue Technik und baue neue Ausrüstung. Kaufe Gebäude und baue sie zu sicheren Zufluchtsstätten aus, falls die Lage mal brenzlig wird, oder nutze sie, um dein eigenes Unternehmen zu gründen. Verbünde dich mit den verschiedenen Fraktionen der Welt oder stelle dich gegen sie, während du in der unerbittlichen Wüste ums Überleben kämpfst. Trainiere deine Truppe von Schwächlingen und mache sie zu mächtigen Kriegern. Schultere deine verwundeten Truppenmitglieder und bring sie lebend nach Hause. FEATURES 
       
  Völlig freies Spielen in einer zusammenhängenden Spielwelt.  Kenshi bietet dir die größte Spielwelt in einem Singleplayer-Rollenspiel seit Daggerfall mit einer Fläche von über 870 Quadratkilometern. Das Spiel versucht nicht, deinen persönlichen Spielstil einzuschränken, sondern lässt dich spielen, wie du willst.
 
       
  Erstelle und gestalte so viele eigene Charaktere, wie du möchtest  und befehlige eine ganze Truppe. Je mehr Erfahrung deine Charaktere sammeln, desto stärker und besser werden sie. Das schlägt sich nicht nur in ihren Werten, sondern auch in ihrem optischen Erscheinungsbild nieder.
 
       
  Baue deine eigene Basis,  wo du neue Techniken erforschen, neue Ausrüstung herstellen und dich gegen Feinde verbarrikadieren kannst.
 
    
  Eine einzigartige Mischung aus Rollenspiel und Echtzeitstrategie.  Hier steuerst du keine übermächtigen "Helden" mit künstlich aufgeblasenen Charakterwerten. Jeder andere Charakter und jeder NPC, auf den du triffst, ist dir potenziell ebenbürtig und hat einen Namen und ein eigenes Leben.
 
    
  Du bist nicht der Auserwählte.  Du bist nicht groß und mächtig. Du hast nicht mehr 'Lebenspunkte' als alle anderen. Da Universum dreht sich nicht um dich, du bist nichts Besonderes. Es sei denn, du erarbeitest es dir.
 
    
  Kaufe Gebäude  und baue sie zu sicheren Zufluchtsstätten aus, falls die Lage mal brenzlig wird, oder nutze sie, um dein eigenes Unternehmen zu gründen.
 
    
  Ein Spiel mit unendlichen Möglichkeiten.  Sei gut, sei böse, sei ein Unternehmer, ein Dieb oder einfach Einwohner einer Stadt. Lebe in der Wüste, reise allein oder bring eine ganze Horde mit, baue eine Festung oder lege eine Stadt in Schutt und Asche. Verschreibe dich der Befreiung von Sklaven oder werde selbst versklavt.
 
    
  Eine dynamische Welt, die sich ständig verändert.   Unterstütze oder bekämpfe jeden, den du möchtest, oder sei ein Eigenbrötler. Was auch immer du tust, die Welt dreht sich weiter. Das hier ist nicht nur ein "Spiel"; du lebst und überlebst in einer simulierten Welt.
 
    
  Du kannst von Kannibalen gefangen und bei lebendigem Leib gefressen werden.  Oder von Sklavenhändlern verkauft und gezwungen, in einer Mine zu schuften. Diese Ereignisse sind nicht geskriptet, sie sind ein dynamischer Bestandteil dieser chaotischen Welt, von einem Augenblick auf den anderen dein Leben ruinieren kann. Alles kann passieren, aber gleichzeitig können alle Schwierigkeiten können überwunden werden, wenn du die Stärke dazu besitzt.
 
    
  Absolut kein Level-Scaling.  Die Welt passt sich nicht der Stärke deiner Charaktere an und Läden ändern nicht ihr Angebot, um dir Gegenstände deiner Stufe anzubieten. Zu Beginn des Spiels wird fast alles und jeder stärker sein als du, und der Kampf ums Überleben hört nie auf. Das Spiel hält dich nicht an der Hand und hilft dir nicht auf, wenn du am Boden bist.
 
    
  Realistisches Medizinsystem mit Auswirkungen auf das Gameplay.  Ein Charakter mit einem verletzten Bein hinkt oder kriecht auf dem Boden und erschwert damit das Vorankommen der Truppe. Charaktere mit verletzten Armen können Schwerter nur mit einer Hand oder eventuell gar nicht verwenden. Sehr schwere Verletzungen können auch Amputationen von Gliedmaßen nach sich ziehen, die anschließend durch Roboter-Prothesen ersetzt werden können. Durch Blutverlust können Charaktere bewusstlos werden. Außerdem lockt das Blut Raubtiere an. Die Werte eines Charakters können durch Ausrüstung, Traglast, Blutverlust, Verletzungen und Hunger beeinflusst werden.
 
    
  Eine kluge KI , dank der Charaktere logisch handeln und auf langfristige Ziele und Wünsche hinarbeiten können. Gruppen arbeiten zusammen und bringen ihre Verwundeten in Sicherheit. Du kannst deinen Charakteren Aufgaben zuteilen, um das Micromanagement zu reduzieren und beispielsweise die Produktion von Gegenständen in deiner Basis zu automatisieren.
 
    
  Verbünde dich mit den verschiedenen Fraktionen der Welt oder stelle dich gegen sie , während du in einer lebensfeindlichen Umgebung ums Überleben kämpfst.
 
    
  Unabhängig entwickelt  ohne jegliche Designeinflüsse von Männern in grauen Anzügen, die noch nie in ihrem Leben ein Spiel gespielt haben.
 
    
  Eine einzigartige Spielwelt  ohne abgedroschene Fantasy-Klischees. Keine Magie.

Um RPG de deslocamento livre baseado em equipes com fogo em recursos de jogabilidade de mundo aberto em vez de uma história linear. Seja um comerciante, um ladrão, um rebelde, um guerreiro, um aventureiro, um fazendeiro, um escravo ou apenas comida para os canibais. 
 
 Pesquise novos equipamentos e crie novos equipamentos. Compre e atualize suas próprias construções para usar como paraísos fortificados e seguros quando as coisas ficarem ruins ou use-as para iniciar um negócio. Alie-se ou oponha-se às várias facções do mundo enquanto se esforça para obter força e os bens necessários para simplesmente sobreviver no deserto hostil. Treine seus homens desde vítimas insignificantes até guerreiros mestres. Salve seus amigos da equipe e leve-os vivos até em casa. Características 
       
 Jogabilidade livre em um mundo de jogo impecável no maior mundo de RPG de jogador único desde Daggerfall, extensível por mais de 870 quilômetros quadrados. O jogo nunca tentará limitar nem restringir seu estilo de jogo pessoal. 
 
       
 Construa quantos personagens quiser e forme uma equipe inteira para lutar por você. Os personagens crescerão e ficarão mais fortes com experiência, não só em atributos, mas também na aparência. 
 
    
 Tomada original do gênero híbrido de RTS-RPG. Nenhum personagem de “herói” com atributos artificialmente mais fortes do que qualquer outro — todos os personagens e PNJs que você conhece são potencialmente um igual e têm um nome, uma vida. 
 
    
 Você não é o escolhido. Você não é grande e poderoso. Você não tem mais “pontos de vida” do que os outros. Você não é o centro do universo nem é especial. A não ser que você trabalhe para isso.
 
       
 Construa uma base para pesquisar novas tecnologias, atualizar as defesas e criar novos equipamentos. 
 
    
 Compre e atualize suas próprias construções para usar como paraísos fortificados e seguros quando as coisas ficarem ruins ou use-as para iniciar um negócio. 
 
    
 Variação e possibilidades da jogabilidade. Seja bom, mau, empresário, ladrão, more em uma cidade, no deserto, viaje sozinho, em hordas, construa uma fortaleza, destrua uma cidade. Dedique-se a libertar escravos ou talvez até tornar-se um. 
 
    
 Mundo dinâmico em mudança constante. Ajude ou atrapalhe quem você quiser ou fique na sua — o mundo não para de girar. Não é só um “jogo”: você está vivendo e sobrevivendo em um mundo simulado.
 
    
 Canibais o capturarão e o comerão vivo ou traficantes de escravos o venderão e o forçarão a trabalhar nas minas. Esses eventos não têm roteiro: são uma parte normal deste mundo caótico que estraga a sua vida ao acaso. Tudo pode acontecer e também é possível superar qualquer coisa conforme a sua força. 
 
    
 Totalmente sem classificação de nível. O mundo não sobe de nível junto com você e as lojas não mudam o estoque apenas para itens compatíveis com o seu nível. No começo do jogo, quase todos serão mais fortes que você e será sempre uma luta para sobreviver. O jogo não vai segurar você pela mão nem ajudá-lo quando você cair. 
 
    
 Sistema médico realista que afeta a jogabilidade. Um personagem com uma perna ferida mancará ou rastejará e atrasará a equipe e, se você estiver com os braços feridos, terá que usar a espada de uma mão ou absolutamente nada. Ferimentos graves resultarão em amputações e na substituição por membros robóticos. A perda de sangue pode fazê-lo desmaiar e o sangue atrairá predadores. Os atributos de um personagem são suscetíveis aos equipamentos, empecilhos, perda de sangue, ferimentos e fome. 
 
    
 IA inteligente que permite que os personagens discutam e trabalhem em prol de objetivos e desejos de longo prazo. Equipes trabalham juntas e carregam seus feridos até um local seguro. É possível configurar os personagens para cuidarem da microgestão para você e produzir em sua base. 
 
    
 Alie-se ou oponha-se às várias facções do mundo enquanto se esforça para obter força e os bens necessários para simplesmente sobreviver num ambiente hostil. 
 
    
 Desenvolvido de forma independente sem influências de design nem alterações ditadas por homens de terno cinza que nunca jogaram nada na vida. 
 
    
 Mundo original do jogo. Não há clichês de fantasia. Não há magia.

直線的なストーリーよりも、オープンワールドにおける自由探索がメインテーマの部隊ベースRPG。商人、盗賊、反乱分子、軍のリーダー、冒険家、農民、奴隷になるか、はたまた人食い人種たちの餌と成り下がるのか、全てはあなた次第。 
 
    
 
 新たな装備を自作するため、新技術を研究しよう。不利な状況に陥った時のために避難できる、または新たな商売を始めるための自分の拠点を建造し、アップグレードしよう。様々な勢力と手を組み、或いは対峙して、富や力を手に入れ、この荒涼とした砂漠を生き抜いていく。部隊仲間を貧弱な被害者から熟練戦士へと育成し、時には負傷した仲間を安全な場所に退避させ、全員で生還しよう。
 
       
 Daggerfall以降最大となる870㎢超の広大なシームレスワールドマップで展開する自由度の高いシングルプレイRPG。このゲームでは、あなたのプレイスタイルに制限や限界はない。
 
       
 思いのままにキャラクターをデザインして、共に戦う部隊を結成しよう。キャラクターたちは経験を積むことで成長して強くなり、ステータスだけではなく外見も変化していく。
 
       
 拠点をつくり 新技術を研究することで、防御や装備などをアップグレード。
 
    
 リアルタイムストラテジー+ロールプレイングゲームという新しいハイブリッドジャンル。不自然なまでに強力なステータスを持つ「英雄」などというキャラクターは存在しない - すべてのキャラクターやNPCたちは同程度の潜在能力や名前をもち、同じような人生を送っている。 
 
    
 あなたは選ばれし者ではない。偉大で力強くもない。他者より多くの「ヒットポイント」をもっているわけではない。世界の中心にいるわけではない、ごく平凡な存在だ。何の努力もしなければの話だが。
 
    
 基地を建造することで、新技術を研究し、防御を固め新たな装備を作ろう。
 
 img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/Purchase_and_upgrade_your_own_buildings.jpg[/img]
 状況が不利になったときに避難できる自分達の拠点を建造し、アップグレードしよう。拠点では、商売も始めることができる。
 
    
 多種多様なゲームプレイ。善人にも悪人にも、商人にも盗賊にも、町に住んでも、砂漠に住んでも、一人旅を楽しんでも、大部隊で移動しても、拠点を建てても、都市を襲っても、それは全てあなた次第。奴隷解放に人生を賭けるか、それとも自ら奴隷と成り果てるか。
 
    
 ダイナミックに刻一刻と変化する世界。誰かを支援したり、誰かの邪魔をしたり、単に引きこもってみたり、それでも世界は絶え間なく動き続ける。これはただの「ゲーム」ではない。あなたはこのシミュレーションワールドで生き抜いていくのだ。
 
    
 カニバルに捕らえられ生きたまま喰われることも、奴隷商人たちに売り飛ばされ鉱山で強制労働に従事することもある。ゲームイベントなどではなく、これは全くのありふれた日常だ。この混沌とした世界は、あなたの人生を狂わせる。ありとあらゆることが起こりうる。しかし、鍛えて強くなりさえすれば、何事にも打ち勝つことができる。 
 
    
 レベル調整は存在しない。あなたのレベルにぴったりのアイテムだけを並べる店などない。あなたのレベルに合わせて世界がレベルアップすることもない。ゲーム開始時のあなたは最弱の存在だ。生存するために、もがき苦しむことになるだろう。倒れたあなたに差し伸べられる救いの手は存在しない。 
 
    
 ゲームプレイには現実的な医学が反映されている。脚を負傷したキャラクターが片足を引きずったり、這いつくばって移動すると部隊全体の移動速度が下がる。腕を負傷すれば片手で剣を振る、あるいは剣を振ることさえできなくなる。深手を負うと、損傷箇所が切断され、義肢を取りつけねばならなくなる。血液を大量に失うと失神するかもしれない、また、その血が肉食動物をおびき寄せるかもしれない。キャラクターのステータスは、装備・負担・血液の残存量・負傷・空腹度に影響を受ける。 
 
    
 インテリジェントAIによる、キャラクターの長期的な目標や要求の理由付けや行動。部隊仲間たちが共に働き、負傷した仲間を安全な場所へと運ぶ。拠点では、キャラクター達を細かな管理で生産活動に従事させられる。
 
    
 この荒涼とした環境で生き抜くための力と富を渇望せよ。その中で様々な勢力と手を組んだり、対峙していこう。
 
    
 ゲームの「ゲ」の字も知らない誰かに内容を指図されることなく、独立した環境で開発された他に類を見ないゲームデザイン。
 
    
 独自のゲームワールド。定番の陳腐なファンタジーは存在しない。魔法もない。

A free-roaming squad based RPG focusing on open-ended sandbox gameplay features rather than a linear story. Be a trader, a thief, a rebel, a warlord, an adventurer, a farmer, a slave, or just food for the cannibals. 
 
    
 
 Research new equipment and craft new gear. Purchase and upgrade your own buildings to use as safe fortified havens when things go bad, or use them to start up a business. Aid or oppose the various factions in the world while striving for the strength and wealth necessary to simply survive in the harsh desert. Train your men up from puny victims to master warriors. Carry your wounded squad mates to safety and get them all home alive. FEATURES 
       
  Freeform gameplay in a seamless game world  in the largest single-player RPG world since Daggerfall, stretching over 870 square kilometers. The game will never seek to limit you or restrict your personal play style. 
 
       
  Custom design as many characters as you want  and build up a whole squad to fight for you. Characters will grow and become stronger with experience, not just in their stats but their appearance too. 
 
       
  Build a base  where you can research new technologies, upgrade your defences and craft new gear. 
 
    
  Original take on the RTS-RPG hybrid genre.  No "hero" characters with artificially stronger stats than everybody else- Every character and NPC you meet is potentially an equal, and has a name, a life. 
 
    
  You are not the chosen one.  You're not great and powerful. You don't have more 'hitpoints' than everyone else. You are not the center of the universe, and you are not special. Unless you work for it.
 
    
  Purchase and upgrade your own buildings  to use as safe fortified havens when things go bad, or use them to start up a business. 
 
    
  Variation and possibilities of gameplay.  Be good, be evil, be a businessman, be a thief, live in a town, live in the desert, travel alone, travel in hordes, build a fortress, raze a city. Devote yourself to freeing slaves, or maybe end up a slave yourself. 
 
    
  Dynamic, ever changing world.  Support or hinder whoever you wish, or keep to yourself, the world won't stop moving. This is not just a "game", you are living and surviving in a simulated world.
 
    
  Get captured by cannibals and eaten alive , or sold off by slavers and forced to work in the mines. These are not scripted events, just a regular part of this chaotic world that ruins your life by chance. Anything can happen, yet anything can be overcome if you have the strength. 
 
    
  Absolutely no Level-scaling.  The world does not level up along with you, and the shops don't change their inventory to only items matching your level. At the start of the game almost everyone will be stronger than you, and survival will always be a struggle. The game won't hold your hand or help you when you're down. 
 
    
  Realistic medical system that affects gameplay.  A character with a wounded leg will limp or crawl and slow the party down, wounded arms means you must use your sword one-handed or not at all. Severe injuries will result in amputees needing robotic limb replacements. Blood loss means you can pass out, and the blood will attract predators. A character’s stats are affected by equipment, encumbrance, blood loss, injuries and starvation. 
 
    
  Intelligent AI  that allows for characters to reason and work towards long-term goals and desires. Squads work together and carry their wounded to safety. Characters can be setup to take care of micromanagement for you and run production in your base. 
 
    
  Aid or oppose the various factions  in the world while striving for the strength and wealth necessary to simply survive in the harsh environment. 
 
    
  Independently developed  with no design influences, or alterations dictated by men in gray suits who have never played a game before in their lives. 
 
    
  Original game world.  There are no fantasy-knock-off cliches. No magic.

title: Book of Travels
description:
Ready your pack, grab your walking stick and step into a world of mystery and legend in Book of Travels. Craft a unique character and immerse yourself in the enchanted lands of Braided Shore. Set your own goals and adventure alone or together with Travellers you meet on the road.
     
Book of Travels is a serene RPG adventure that sets you adrift in a fairytale world without the restraints of linear missions and plotlines.  
        
  
Book of Travels is all about the journey, not the destination. Explore the wilds and visit the cities of the Braided Shore peninsula. Wander deep into the layers of this hand-drawn world, stumble upon its hidden places or unravel its many mysteries. There is no overarching goal and no real beginning or end.
     
  Braided Shore is a vast and intricate world, but meetings with other players are few and far between, so your chance encounters will be something special. Choose to collaborate with other players or to travel alone.

  Take note: This is a game for wayfinders and wanderers and your route is not pre-destined. Instead, it will be up to you to play in your own style and to shape your own journey. Whichever way you choose to travel, you’ll soon be adding your own chapters to Book of Travels.
  
        
• Roleplaying and individual playstyles  
 Pick one of 12 different Forms in a detailed character creation sheet that focuses on personality and identity rather than stats and classes. The game allows you to play in a style that matches your character and set your own personal goals. Are you a danger-seeking adventurer, a stoic practitioner of magic binding, or a carefree tea drinking gambler?     
     
• A narrative that won’t hold your hand   
 Your travels will present you with randomly occurring events making your story unique and each session different from the last. Peel back the layers of diverse plotlines and discover a deep fairytale world. 
     
• TMO – Tiny Multiplayer Online  
 Other players are few, but your paths will cross – it’s up to you to choose to travel together or go it alone. Find vehicles to reach far flung places or just amble through woods together. The absence of guilds and social structures makes your temporary fellowships unique and memorable. 
     
• A beautiful world of uncertainty  
 An intricate and unique world that draws inspiration from old-world fairytales, Eastern mythologies and early industrial eras. Intricate event chains unlock items, characters, deep world secrets, and hidden gameplay features and tricks. 
     
• Communicate using symbols  
 Learn to use a unique set of symbols to communicate with other players.  
     
• Innovative RPG systems  
 Define your character by unlocking and mastering 100+ abilities, magical skills and passive feats that will have a huge impact on your character and open different experiences of the game. Gain experience in numerous ways: by exploring, being courteous, gathering and trading. Battles can be rewarding, but you will learn more in defeat than in victory.  
     
• The world is a hand painted diorama  
 Experience a unique game view perspective ‘painted’ in a richly detailed art style. Click to walk like old school RPGs, but in scenes with 3-dimensional depth. 

  Quotes: Book Of Travels' online cRPG world may be the cure for my break-up with MMOs     
 
  "I believe [creative director Jakob Tuchten] understands, and maybe relates to, why I've broken up with MMOs, which is why I have faith (and even ten hours in, it is still faith) that Book Of Travels is the match I'd been waiting for. " — Rock, Paper, Shotgun
    
Book of Travels Preview: Building Folklore In Multiplayer      
  
"Book of Travels creates a unique take on the multiplayer experience, with an atmospheric and beautiful game made for smaller groups of players. " — ScreenRant
     
  "Feels like a Shakespearean sonnet written in code – a love letter to a genre that's become diluted with vapid quests, superficial choices and ostentatious combat. " — Edge magazine   
   
     
  Awards 

• Massively OP’s 2019 Awards: Most Anticipated MMO
  ”Book of Travels, the only game on Kickstarter I backed all year. I was dead serious when I said I wanted to play something weird and unique, something that pushes the boundaries of what MMOs are supposed to be, and it helps that it’s super pretty too.” — Brianna Royce

Ready your pack, grab your walking stick and step into a world of mystery and legend in Book of Travels. Craft a unique character and immerse yourself in the enchanted lands of Braided Shore. Set your own goals and adventure alone or together with Travellers you meet on the road.
     
Book of Travels is a serene RPG adventure that sets you adrift in a fairytale world without the restraints of linear missions and plotlines.  
        
  
Book of Travels is all about the journey, not the destination. Explore the wilds and visit the cities of the Braided Shore peninsula. Wander deep into the layers of this hand-drawn world, stumble upon its hidden places or unravel its many mysteries. There is no overarching goal and no real beginning or end.
     
  Braided Shore is a vast and intricate world, but meetings with other players are few and far between, so your chance encounters will be something special. Choose to collaborate with other players or to travel alone.

  Take note: This is a game for wayfinders and wanderers and your route is not pre-destined. Instead, it will be up to you to play in your own style and to shape your own journey. Whichever way you choose to travel, you’ll soon be adding your own chapters to Book of Travels.
  
        
• Roleplaying and individual playstyles  
 Pick one of 12 different Forms in a detailed character creation sheet that focuses on personality and identity rather than stats and classes. The game allows you to play in a style that matches your character and set your own personal goals. Are you a danger-seeking adventurer, a stoic practitioner of magic binding, or a carefree tea drinking gambler?     
     
• A narrative that won’t hold your hand   
 Your travels will present you with randomly occurring events making your story unique and each session different from the last. Peel back the layers of diverse plotlines and discover a deep fairytale world. 
     
• TMO – Tiny Multiplayer Online  
 Other players are few, but your paths will cross – it’s up to you to choose to travel together or go it alone. Find vehicles to reach far flung places or just amble through woods together. The absence of guilds and social structures makes your temporary fellowships unique and memorable. 
     
• A beautiful world of uncertainty  
 An intricate and unique world that draws inspiration from old-world fairytales, Eastern mythologies and early industrial eras. Intricate event chains unlock items, characters, deep world secrets, and hidden gameplay features and tricks. 
     
• Communicate using symbols  
 Learn to use a unique set of symbols to communicate with other players.  
     
• Innovative RPG systems  
 Define your character by unlocking and mastering 100+ abilities, magical skills and passive feats that will have a huge impact on your character and open different experiences of the game. Gain experience in numerous ways: by exploring, being courteous, gathering and trading. Battles can be rewarding, but you will learn more in defeat than in victory.  
     
• The world is a hand painted diorama  
 Experience a unique game view perspective ‘painted’ in a richly detailed art style. Click to walk like old school RPGs, but in scenes with 3-dimensional depth. 

  Quotes: Book Of Travels' online cRPG world may be the cure for my break-up with MMOs     
 
  "I believe [creative director Jakob Tuchten] understands, and maybe relates to, why I've broken up with MMOs, which is why I have faith (and even ten hours in, it is still faith) that Book Of Travels is the match I'd been waiting for. " — Rock, Paper, Shotgun
    
Book of Travels Preview: Building Folklore In Multiplayer      
  
"Book of Travels creates a unique take on the multiplayer experience, with an atmospheric and beautiful game made for smaller groups of players. " — ScreenRant
     
  "Feels like a Shakespearean sonnet written in code – a love letter to a genre that's become diluted with vapid quests, superficial choices and ostentatious combat. " — Edge magazine

• Massively OP’s 2019 Awards: Most Anticipated MMO
  ”Book of Travels, the only game on Kickstarter I backed all year. I was dead serious when I said I wanted to play something weird and unique, something that pushes the boundaries of what MMOs are supposed to be, and it helps that it’s super pretty too.” — Brianna Royce
 
 • Massively OP’s 2020 Awards: Most Anticipated MMO
  ”Book of Travels was the game that stole my heart in 2019 with its Kickstarter campaign and wildly different and creative premise. A serene MMO? Sure, I’m up for that!” — Justin Olivetti

Únete a Book of Travels y forma parte de una experiencia de rol social única y sin ataduras. Esta apacible aventura inspirada en los clásicos del género te transporta a un mundo de fantasía y te invita a rolear sin restricciones, misiones ni líneas argumentales. Siéntete libre de explorar la naturaleza salvaje y las concurridas ciudades de la península de Braided Shore. Sumérgete en este mundo dibujado a mano, descubre sus rincones ocultos y desvela sus numerosos misterios. No hay objetivos, ni final, ni principio, pero sí muchos riesgos para los personajes mortales.
 
 El mundo de Braided Shore es vasto y complejo, pero, de vez en cuando, te cruzarás con otros jugadores; al ser algo poco frecuente, cada encuentro se convertirá en una ocasión especial. Tanto si cooperas con alguien como si sobrevives por tu cuenta, participarás en el nacimiento de una nueva comunidad en línea en la que se fraguarán todo tipo de historias.
 
 Pero recuerda: es un juego para exploradores y trotamundos, no hay rutas predeterminadas. Tendrás que jugar a tu ritmo y desarrollar tu propia historia. Viajes como viajes, una cosa es segura: poco a poco, irás escribiendo tus propios capítulos de Book of Travels.

Rejoignez The Book of Travels et participez à une expérience de jeu de rôle unique dans laquelle vous explorez le monde à votre guise. Inspiré des classiques du genre, ce jeu propose une aventure sereine qui vous permet de flâner dans une ambiance de conte de fées, tout en offrant un jeu de rôle sans les restrictions des missions linéaires et des intrigues habituelles. Dans Book of Travels, vous êtes libre d'explorer les étendues sauvages et les villes animées de la péninsule de la Corniche d'Étorsade. Explorez toutes les couches de ce monde dessiné à la main, découvrez ses endroits cachés ou élucidez l'un de ses nombreux mystères. Le jeu ne vous guide pas selon un objectif général, il n'y a pas vraiment de début ni de fin, mais pour les personnages mortels, les enjeux peuvent être considérables.
 
 La Corniche d'Étorsade est un vaste monde complexe, mais les rencontres avec les autres joueurs sont rares, alors l'expérience sera d'autant plus spéciale lorsque vous croiserez quelqu'un par hasard. Que vous choisissiez de collaborer ou de survivre en solitaire, vous contribuerez à la création d'une nouvelle communauté en ligne fascinante où de nombreux récits seront contés.
 
 Il est important de noter que ce jeu est conçu pour les explorateurs et les voyageurs. Il ne vous guidera pas sur une voie particulière, mais vous laissera jouer selon votre style pour que vous puissiez créer votre aventure personnelle. Quelle que soit la direction que vous prendrez, vous commencerez rapidement à ajouter vos chapitres au Récit de voyage.

Erlebe das Buch der Reisen und werde Teil einer einzigartigen Rollenspielerfahrung, bei der du dich selbst zurecht finden musst. Dieses anmutige, von Genreklassikern inspirierte Spiel entführt dich in eine märchenhafte Welt voller Abenteuer und verzichtet auf lineare Missionen oder Handlungsstränge. Erlebe die völlige Freiheit, während du die ungezähmte Wildnis und die lebhaften Städte der Umwobenen Ufer erkundest. Tauche tief in die vielschichtige, handgezeichnete Welt ein, entdecke verborgene Orte oder lüfte eines der vielen Geheimnisse. Es gibt kein übergeordnetes Ziel und weder Anfang noch Ende, doch für sterbliche Charaktere kann in dieser Welt viel auf dem Spiel stehen.
 
 Die Welt der Umwobenen Ufer ist groß und voller Windungen. Begegnungen mit anderen Spielern sind selten, und genau das macht sie so besonders. Ob du mit anderen zusammenarbeiten oder auf eigene Faust überleben möchtest, bleibt ganz dir überlassen. Doch egal, für welchen Spielstil du dich entscheidest, du wirst die Geburt einer spannenden, neuen Online-Community erleben, in der man sich noch viele Geschichten erzählen wird.
 
 Doch sei gewarnt: Dies ist ein Spiel für wahre Entdecker, die ihren eigenen Weg gehen wollen. Es liefert dir keine vorgefertigten Routen sondern vertraut darauf, dass du deine Reise unabhängig gestaltest. Und welchen Lauf dein Abenteuer auch immer nehmen mag, du wirst das Buch der Reisen bald um deine ganz eigenen Kapitel erweitern können.

title: Amazing Cultivation Simulator
description:
Join the community   Join our community on Discord and meet other cultivators like you! You’ll find many users willing to help you become the most powerful grandmaster. Come with us today and find out for yourself!
 
 
  About the Game    
 In a world of myth and magic, those who aspire to immortality devote their lives to the sacred path of cultivation. They gather around sects, institutions which train their bodies, minds and souls to be worth eternal life. But in return for such great power, you must be willing to guard the balance between good and evil -- no matter the cost.
 
 Unfortunately, greed is inherent to human nature, so it also blinds cultivators. Your master didn’t realize until it was too late, and the Taiyi Sect burnt to the ground for his mistake. Your brothers and sisters will never come back, but the Taiyi Sect can still be reborn from its ashes. Its seeds are scattered around Tiancang, waiting for you to find them. This is what your grandmaster would have wanted. You must do it for him ─ and for all those we sworn to protect.
 
 Set in the fictional Tiancang era, Amazing Cultivation Simulator brings to you the magic of Asian mythology through a strategy game with strong xianxia nuances, a Chinese literary genre which is deeply influenced by Taoist and Buddhist concepts, as well as folklore and traditional knowledge on medicine and martial arts. Its gameplay is inspired by famous games like Rimworld and Dwarf Fortress, as well as The Legend of Shushan Swordsman and Martial Kingdoms.
 
 As a grandmaster, you’ll bring the Taiyi Sect back to its glory days by training new apprentices, gathering knowledge and expand your domain through commerce and political alliances to gain influence over other sects. Also, you must protect people from supernatural dangers such as bad spirits, monsters and enchanted artifacts. KEY FEATURES    Design your own Cultivation sect  from scratch until it becomes a huge spiritual center.
    Manage your school and students  so they are happy and productive for you.
    Expand your domain s and meet new allies to become more powerful than other sects.
    Commerce and interact with other NPCs , but be careful – your actions will impact their behavior!
    Keep the balance  between good and evil.
    Research and fill your library  with more and more sources of mystic knowledge, martial arts, medicine…
    Search for the most powerful relics  and artifacts.
    Hunt evil beasts and demons  that want to destroy the world you want to protect.
   Live  unique playthroughs every time : maps are randomly generated for each run.
   Learn about  Chinese myths and legends , as well as spiritual traditions which draw from Taoism and Buddhism.   Update 
 
    
   Yaoguai Awakening: As Qi energies resurge across the lands, the Yaoguai finally return to the mortal realm. Enlightened beasts start cultivation of their own, craving a longer life, but they still can't escape the Creed of Heaven or the Heavenly Tribulation.
   Taoist Animism: Even the most base of existences have the chance to attain spirituality as they subsist throughout the mists of time. If fortunate enough, some might even be enlightened by a master and turned into sentient spirits. After acquiring a human body through Body Genesis, they are all set to begin their cultivation.
   Physical Cultivation: Ancient Yaoguai never bothered to become enlightened or to meditate on the Creed of Heaven. They domineered the realm with their brutal physical strength. They follow their instincts and burn their own vital energy to refine their bodies with nature's essence, until they can even block flying swords and survive the Heavenly Tribulation with mere mortal bodies. 
   Pet Training: Spiritual pets are special creatures with mighty forms and profound potential. They are also manifestations of the rules of nature. Learn to train your sect's pet, and have them serve your needs.
   More Plotlines: As the ancient Yaoguai return, the realm of cultivators will witness an unprecedented upheaval that shall spare no creature. But is it a blessing or a curse? 
   Updated Tutorial: In the Yaoguai Uprising update, we made a complete, step-by-step tutorial to help new players learn all the controls and game systems so that everyone can experience the fun of cultivation.
   Encyclopedia: All kinds of items, laws and monsters are recorded here. You can reflect on your journey and also anticipate new adventures.  
    
   Beast Siege: The Phoenix, Jiao-dragon and Torch Dragon have all awoken. Threatened by the invasion of the three mighty ancient beasts, will your sect be able to survive the trials that await?
   Roaming Sages: To hunt ancient beasts, one must become a true cultivation champion. Myriad mysterious sages from different sects start roaming the world far and wide. To your sect, this shall be both an opportunity and a brand-new challenge.
   Elemental Medicines: The planting methods of dozens of powerful elemental herbs have been found. A storeroom full of potent elemental medicines is a dream no longer!
   Building Rotation: Build your sect as you like.
   Animal Farming: You can now feed paralyzed animals, using their favorite food as bait to try and tame them.
   Feng Shui Relic: Regular items may have stats that make them a Feng Shui Relic.  
    
   Explore the World: Almost the entire world is yours to explore. Cultivators can travel the lands over to find hidden treasures and face secret challenges.
   Sect War: Except for the Daemonia Temple, all the sects now have their own bases. Countless treasures, ancient formation diagrams, forgotten rare artifacts and magnificent buildings can all be found within.
   Interactive World: NPC sects now interact with each other, with consequences for their power and influence which constantly shift to create an ever-changing world of cultivators.
   Formation: A complete Formation consists of one cultivator acting as the Pillar and several others as Auxiliaries. By searching for manuals and meditating on the Creed of Heaven, cultivators can learn to become new types of Pillars and Auxiliaries that connect with each other to create Formations.
   Sub-Spirits: Cultivators that have achieved the Primordial Spirit state or above can train, study secret moves, take elixirs, meditate on the Creed of Heaven and challenge the Heavenly Tribulation to obtain sub-spirits. Sub-spirits can help cultivators with Primordial Spirits make great progress in their practice.
   Various Tribulations: Once their attainment and lifespan limits are reached, cultivators can take on the corresponding Heavenly Tribulations to break through and earn themselves new realms of progress.  
    
   Cultivation Laws: Thousands of laws have been discovered in the realm of cultivators, each law worth studying and learning if only for its uniqueness alone. Learn the best of all the cultivation laws and push yourself to a higher state of existence!
   Path of Shendao: Collect beliefs from mortals to increase your power. Build a divine realm in the void to become your own god. Channel power from all the heavenly guards to craft your own sacred artifact.
   Mini Universe: A Bounded Universe created with elemental forces. Most regular items can be contained within it. You needn’t leave all your items on the floor any more. Just store them in the Mini Universe!
   Expand Your Sect: Send outer disciples out into the mortal world to create an agency for your sect. Help mortals solve their problems, earn their trust and loyalty and obtain local products.
   Commerce: As sects interact with each other, immortals will begin to trade more often. Obtain specialties exclusive to each sect, and meet mysterious merchants travelling around the world; even Ye Xuan the Gambler has opened an auction house.
   Each to Their Own: Disciples from all sects now have their own names with secrets, hobbies and stories to tell. Make friends around the world and uncover all kinds of interesting information.  
     Cultivation   Over 10 cultivation laws, waiting to be discovered and practiced.
   Over 40 miracles, presenting you with loads of different cultivation experiences.
   Over 40 elixirs and 30 talismans, each with their own interesting effects.
   Everything can be crafted into artifacts.
   Achieve a higher cultivation state and collect amazing treasures to prolong your lifespan.
   Increase your cultivation in all aspects to prepare for the Heavenly Tribulation.   Battle   Master your artifacts and use them to battle against enemies.
   Each character comes with a realistic physical body, meaning there’s countless possibilities within each and every battle.
   Use powerful secret laws to their fullest extents to turn the tide of battle.   Adventure   Send disciples on adventures to encounter fortuitous events, investigate secrets and collect treasures.
   It's your decision whether to do good or torment others around you.
   Hundreds of event chains are waiting for you to explore  
     Survival   Collect resources like food and wood and survive in strange forests.
   Build houses and grow crops to expand your sect.
   Store resources to prepare for challenging and harsh weather.
   Prepare to face opportunities and challenges brought by mythical beasts such as Lushu, Fei..   Crafting   There’s hundreds of different kinds of food, weapons, clothing and accessories.
   Your finished product will inherit the traits of the original materials used each time you craft.   Building   Adhere to Feng Shui according to the interactions between the Five Elements, and create your very own Earthly Paradise.
   The right layout will increase the efficiency and aesthetics of your sect.   Socializing   Parents, lovers, friends and enemies. Through tactics and strategy, you must handle the relationships of your disciples.
   Thousands of social events await, providing you with a rich and interesting sect life.  
     Challenges:   Obtain achievements in Hardcore mode, and accept the challenge of a life where if you die, that’s it.   Mods:   Mod development will be implemented steadily. We can’t wait to build a world of cultivation with you all!   Crossover:   We have plans to collaborate with various other excellent games. Remember to support the developers you love!   DLC:   We will continue to develop new and exciting content in the days to come: Pet keeping, Yaoguai Uprising and sect wars are all coming soon!

   Updated Tutorial: In the Yaoguai Uprising update, we made a complete, step-by-step tutorial to help new players learn all the controls and game systems so that everyone can experience the fun of cultivation.
   Encyclopedia: All kinds of items, laws and monsters are recorded here. You can reflect on your journey and also anticipate new adventures.  
    
   Beast Siege: The Phoenix, Jiao-dragon and Torch Dragon have all awoken. Threatened by the invasion of the three mighty ancient beasts, will your sect be able to survive the trials that await?
   Roaming Sages: To hunt ancient beasts, one must become a true cultivation champion. Myriad mysterious sages from different sects start roaming the world far and wide. To your sect, this shall be both an opportunity and a brand-new challenge.
   Elemental Medicines: The planting methods of dozens of powerful elemental herbs have been found. A storeroom full of potent elemental medicines is a dream no longer!
   Building Rotation: Build your sect as you like.
   Animal Farming: You can now feed paralyzed animals, using their favorite food as bait to try and tame them.
   Feng Shui Relic: Regular items may have stats that make them a Feng Shui Relic.  
    
   Explore the World: Almost the entire world is yours to explore. Cultivators can travel the lands over to find hidden treasures and face secret challenges.
   Sect War: Except for the Daemonia Temple, all the sects now have their own bases. Countless treasures, ancient formation diagrams, forgotten rare artifacts and magnificent buildings can all be found within.
   Interactive World: NPC sects now interact with each other, with consequences for their power and influence which constantly shift to create an ever-changing world of cultivators.
   Formation: A complete Formation consists of one cultivator acting as the Pillar and several others as Auxiliaries. By searching for manuals and meditating on the Creed of Heaven, cultivators can learn to become new types of Pillars and Auxiliaries that connect with each other to create Formations.

   Cultivation Laws: Thousands of laws have been discovered in the realm of cultivators, each law worth studying and learning if only for its uniqueness alone. Learn the best of all the cultivation laws and push yourself to a higher state of existence!

   Over 40 miracles, presenting you with loads of different cultivation experiences.
   Over 40 elixirs and 30 talismans, each with their own interesting effects.
   Everything can be crafted into artifacts.
   Achieve a higher cultivation state and collect amazing treasures to prolong your lifespan.
   Increase your cultivation in all aspects to prepare for the Heavenly Tribulation.   Battle   Master your artifacts and use them to battle against enemies.

   It's your decision whether to do good or torment others around you.
   Hundreds of event chains are waiting for you to explore

   Build houses and grow crops to expand your sect.
   Store resources to prepare for challenging and harsh weather.
   Prepare to face opportunities and challenges brought by mythical beasts such as Lushu, Fei..   Crafting   There’s hundreds of different kinds of food, weapons, clothing and accessories.
   Your finished product will inherit the traits of the original materials used each time you craft.   Building   Adhere to Feng Shui according to the interactions between the Five Elements, and create your very own Earthly Paradise.
   The right layout will increase the efficiency and aesthetics of your sect.   Socializing   Parents, lovers, friends and enemies. Through tactics and strategy, you must handle the relationships of your disciples.
   Thousands of social events await, providing you with a rich and interesting sect life.  
     Challenges:   Obtain achievements in Hardcore mode, and accept the challenge of a life where if you die, that’s it.   Mods:   Mod development will be implemented steadily. We can’t wait to build a world of cultivation with you all!   Crossover:   We have plans to collaborate with various other excellent games. Remember to support the developers you love!   DLC:   We will continue to develop new and exciting content in the days to come: Pet keeping, Yaoguai Uprising and sect wars are all coming soon!
